details.description: Use this calculator to work out if you're better off getting childcare vouchers from your employer or claiming tax credits
details.more_information:
You will need:

  • details of your income (and your partner’s if you have one) for this and the last tax year
  • your weekly childcare costs
  • the amount of childcare vouchers or payments your employer makes directly to a childcare provider for you
  • the start date of the vouchers/employer payments

If your employer makes direct payments to a childcare provider, treat those payments as if they were vouchers when using the calculator.

If you have a disability

If any of the following apply, answer ‘yes’ when the calculator asks if you’re disabled:

  • you get the Highest Rate Care Component of Disability Living Allowance
  • you get the Higher Rate of Attendance Allowance
  • you have a disability and meet the conditions for extra Working Tax Credit
details.introduction: Childcare vouchers from your employer may affect the amount of tax credits you get. This calculator can help you decide if you would be better off taking childcare vouchers or not.
